rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Large open space to welcome guests. Vastu compliant entrance aligned with the north-east direction.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Multi-functional area for family gatherings. Features eco-friendly lighting and natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern yet energy efficient kitchen design with provisions for waste segregation and water recycling systems. Aligned to the south-east corner per Vastu.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen to facilitate serving food while incorporating natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy space with eco-friendly materials. Placed in a quiet corner following Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Front Door
openings.description: Energy-efficient door with low-emission seals and good insulation. Oriented according to Vastu.

openings.name: Balcony Entrance
openings.description: Provides access to the terrace area for fresh air and sunlight exposure.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom for the parents. Features a walk-in closet and eco-friendly insulation. Placed in the north-west sector per Vastu.

rooms.name: Children's Bedroom
rooms.description: Room shared by children with natural light from east-facing windows.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace for remote work or study. Designed to minimize distractions and maximize productivity.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated fitness area with eco-friendly flooring and sufficient ventilation.

openings.name: Fire Escape Window
openings.description: Safety opening for emergencies, ensuring compliance with local building regulations.
